amendment.description: To provide an extension and increase in minimum tax relief to individuals.

action.text: Amendment SA 2647, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2647 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2647 proposed by Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S13113-13114; text: CR S13113-13114) To provide an extension and increase in minimum tax relief to individuals.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2647 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2647 proposed by Senator Grassley.
